IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfPeels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of depth peeling, define the maximum number of peeling layers. Initial value is 4. A special value of 0 means no maximum limit. It has to be a positive value.

Proxy.name: MapperBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines interface defined by vtkMapper. Don't instantiate directly.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

SourceProxy.name: GPUVolumeRayCastMapper
SourceProxy.Documentation: This is the proxy for GPU based volume rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlendMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current blend mode. Default is Composite. MaximumIntensity is also known as MIP rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoAdjustSampleDistances
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If AutoAdjustSampleDistances is on, the the ImageSampleDistance will be varied to achieve the allocated render time of this prop (controlled by the desired update rate and any culling in use).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SampleDistance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/Get the distance between samples used for rendering when AutoAdjustSampleDistances is off, or when this mapper has more than 1 second allocated to it for rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlendMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current blend mode. Default is Composite. MaximumIntensity is also known as MIP rendering.

SourceProxy.name: ImageSliceMapper
SourceProxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkImageMapper. We may need to change this to be a proxy for a new class, vtkPVImageMapper which can use different point data attributes as scalars in the image.

IntVectorProperty.name: Slice
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.

IntVectorProperty.name: SliceMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set if scalar mapping must be used even when the input image data scalars are unsigned chars i.e. they can be directly rendered as color.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select where to find the scalars.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the name for the scalar array.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseXYPlane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the image slice is always rendered in the XY plane (Z==0) irrespective of the image bounds. Default if Off.

StringVectorProperty.name: XCoordsArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the X coords array.

StringVectorProperty.name: YCoordsArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the Y coords array.

StringVectorProperty.name: ZCoordsArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the Z coords array.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorizeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the color array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphXScalingArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph x scaling array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphYScalingArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph y scaling array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphZScalingArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph z scaling array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphSourceArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph source array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphXOrientationArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph x orientation array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphYOrientationArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph y orientation array.

StringVectorProperty.name: GlyphZOrientationArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array for the glyph z orientation array.

ImageTextureProxy.name: ImageTexture
ImageTextureProxy.Documentation: This is a proxy for a vtkTexture which also includes an image file reader. This reader can read an image of client/data server or render server and then transmit it to the client/render server where it will be used for texturing.

Proxy.name: TextActor
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for a text actor. Not to be used directly.

Proxy.name: ActorBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines interface for an actor. Don't instantiate this proxy itself.

BoxRepresentationProxy.name: BoxRepresentation
BoxRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkBoxRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the box widget (which is the BoxWidgetRepresentation).

Proxy.name: SphereRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkSphereRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the sphere widget (which is the SphereWidgetRepresentation).

IntVectorProperty.name: Representation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the representation (i.e., appearance) of the sphere. Different representations are useful depending on the application.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The center position of the sphere. Note that this may adjust the direction from the handle to the center, as well as the radius of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The radius of sphere. Default is 0.5. Note that this may modify the position of the handle based on the handle direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The handle sits on the surface of the sphere and may be moved around the surface by picking (left mouse) and then moving. The position of the handle can be retrieved, this is useful for positioning cameras and lights. By default, the handle is turned off.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleText
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a label that displays the location of the handle in spherical coordinates (radius,theta,phi). The two angles, theta and phi, are displayed in degrees. Note that phi is measured from the north pole down towards the equator; and theta is the angle around the north/south axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialLine
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a radial line segment that joins the center of the outer sphere and the handle.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: HandleDirection
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/Get the direction vector of the handle relative to the center of the sphere. This may affect the position of the handle and the radius of the sphere.

Proxy.name: SplineRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkSplineRepresentation. Don't use directly since it's not coupled with the widget. Use "SplineWidgetRepresentation" instead which include this representation as well as the widget to modify the representation.

Proxy.name: ContourRepresentationBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines interface defined by vtkContourRepresentation. Don't instantiate directly.

Proxy.name: OrientedGlyphContourRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkOrientedGlyphContourRepresentation. Don't use directly since it's not coupled with the widget. Use "ContourWidgetRepresentation" instead which include this representation as well as the widget to modify the representation.

ProxyProperty.name: Property
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the property used to determine the appearance of the axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this actor.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Bounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the bounds for this cube axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: FlyMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a mode to control how the axes are drawn: either static, closest triad, furthest triad or outer edges in relation to the camera position.

IntVectorProperty.name: Inertia
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the inertial factor that controls how often (i.e, how many renders) the axes can switch position (jump from one axes to another).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CornerOffset
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an offset value to "pull back" the axes from the corner at which they are joined to avoid overlap of axes labels. The "CornerOffset" is the fraction of the axis length to pull back.

StringVectorProperty.name: XTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the X axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Y axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: ZTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if X axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Y axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Z axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: TickLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of tick marks.

Proxy.name: LegendScaleActor
Proxy.Documentation: This is a proxy for vtkLegendScaleActor. vtkLegendScaleActor can be used to annotate the render window with scale and distance information.

Proxy.name: PropertyBase
Proxy.Documentation: This is a vtkProperty API without any color properties.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge color. This color is used to draw the edge for the polygonal data when EdgeVisibility is on.

IntVectorProperty.name: EdgeVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge visibility. This has any effect only when Visibility is On and Representation type if Surface.

IntVectorProperty.name: BackfaceCulling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off backface culling. When on, polygons facing away from the camera will not be drawn.

IntVectorProperty.name: FrontfaceCulling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off frontface culling. When on, polygons facing towards from the camera will not be drawn.

Proxy.name: Property
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkProperty with 3 separate properties for the 3 colors.

Proxy.name: Property2
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkProperty with a single property "Color" for controlling all the 3 color components.

IntVectorProperty.name: SynchronizeTileProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the render manager will synchronize the TileViewport and TileScale properties. This may not be desirable in cases where there's some other mechanism to set the tile dimensions eg. Tile displays.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableTiles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To use tile displays, it is essential to set this property to 1.

SimpleStrategy.name: PolyDataStrategy
SimpleStrategy.Documentation: Representation stragegy can be used for poly data surface rendering with LOD. (Does not support client-server/parallel pipelines).

SimpleStrategy.name: UnstructuredGridStrategy
SimpleStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy can be used for unstructured grid volume rendering. This differs from PolyDataStrategy in the LODDecimator. Here, we are using a GeometryFilter as the LODDecimator.

UniformGridParallelStrategy.name: UniformGridParallelStrategy
UniformGridParallelStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy can be used for uniform grid volume rendering.

ImageDataParallelStrategy.name: ImageDataParallelStrategy
ImageDataParallelStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy that can be used for image data. This strategy delivers the image data to the rendering process, hence not suitable for using when doing volume rendering.

BlockDeliveryStrategy.name: BlockDeliveryStrategy
BlockDeliveryStrategy.Documentation: Strategy used by BlockDeliveryStrategy for updating the pipeline.

ServerManagerConfiguration.ProxyGroup:
Defines common API for all views.
Add representations to be rendered by this view.
Position of the view. This is useful in multiview configurations.
Total GUI size when using mutliple views. This includes the sizes of all view modules.
The pipeline update time for this view. This gets passed to all representations added to this view.
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
Defines common options API for all chart views.
Set the chart title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
#endif
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
This is a proxy for the BarChart view.
#endif
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
This is the proxy for XY plot view.
Set the chart title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).
This is the proxy for bar chart view.
This is the proxy for XY plot view.
#endif
This defines the properties/subproxies common to all render view subclasses.
Set the memory size threshold above which LOD will be used while rendering interactively.
Set the LOD resolution.
Set whether triangle strips should be used when rendering polydata.
Enable/Disable the LightKit.
Called to reset the camera using current data bounts.
Set whether offscreen rendering should be used during CaptureWindow calls.
Simplest render view without compositing/client-server support.
IceT Render View with compositing which can be used when no client-server delivery is required.
The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering.
The image reduction factor used for compositing parallel images in InteractiveRender. ImageReductionFactor=1 implies no reduction at all.
Set the view size for this view module.
Ordered compositing is used if any representation added to the view indicates that it requires ordered compositing. This flag can be set to true to override this behaviour.
IceT Render View with compositing and client delivery mechanisms.
Set the view size for this view module.
The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. This may alternatively thought as the remote render threshold, since when ever we use compositing, we render on the server.
The image reduction factor used for compositing parallel images in InteractiveRender. ImageReductionFactor=1 implies no reduction at all.
Ordered compositing is used if any representation added to the view indicates that it requires ordered compositing. This flag can be set to true to override this behaviour.
IceT Render View for tile displays.
Select the threshold under which any geometry is collected on the client. When the data size exceeds the threshold, the client shows outlines instead of actual data. Size is in kilobytes.
Set the reduction factor to use when still rendering.
The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering on the tile display.
Position of the view. This is useful in multiview configurations.
Total GUI size when using mutliple views. This includes the sizes of all view modules.
The ViewSize to use for gapless multi display on the server.
Render View with client delivery mechanism. Does not support paralle rendering.
The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. This may alternatively thought as the remote render threshold, since when ever we use compositing, we render on the server.
Base interface for the ComparativeView. It has all the properties except the RootView subproxy.
Set the view size for this view module.
Set the time range for FilmStrip visualizations.
This property determines how individual frames of the comparative view will update when a source or filter displayed by the view is modified. When none is selected, no frames will update until the comparative view is explicity updated. When root is selected, the root frame will update but the other frames will not update until the comparative view is explicity updated. When all is selected, all frames will update.
This property controls how the comparative view displays time. When show timesteps is off, the global time is displayed in each frame. When show timesteps is on, the comparative view displays different timesteps in each frame. When show timesteps is on, the global time is ignored.
The is comparative view comprising of individual "RenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
The is comparative view comprising of individual "IceTDesktopRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
The is comparative view comprising of individual "IceTMultiDisplayRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
The is comparative view comprising of individual "ClientServerRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
The is comparative view comprising of individual "XYPlotView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
#endif
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
The is comparative view comprising of individual "BarChartView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.
#endif
Defines base API for 2DRenderView and subtypes. Don't use directly.
Simplest 2D render view without compositing/client-server support. Currently this view can only show image slices.
IceT based 2D render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.
IceT based 2D render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.
This is a 2D view comprising of a "IceTMultiDisplayRenderView" proxy (used in case of Tile displays).
2D view used in client-server mode without IceT (single node server).
Defines base API for ScatterPlotView and subtypes. Don't use directly.
Simplest ScatterPlot render view without compositing/client-server support. Currently this view can only show image slices.
IceT based ScatterPlot render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.
IceT based ScatterPlot render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.
This is a ScatterPlot view comprising of a "IceTMultiDisplayRenderView" proxy (used in case of Tile displays).
ScatterPlot view used in client-server mode without IceT (single node server).
Cave Render View for tile displays.

Proxy to show a selection as geometry.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the visibility of the cell labels for this representation. This is ignored if Visibility is 0.
Set the visibility for this representation. This is ignored if Visibility is 0.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
API for for SurfaceRepresentation.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.
Representation to show surface.
Representation to show 2D images. If the input image has 3D extents, then this representation shows a single Z slice.
Set the input to the representation. Must be a vtkImageData producer.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Select the attribute type from where the scalars array is used. The scalar array name is specified using ColorArrayName. Note that if the indicated scalar array is not available, then the image data scalars are used.
Set the array name to color by. If no array name is set, or choosen array is not available, then the image scalars are used by default.
Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.
Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.
Set the lookup table to use for mapping scalars to color.
In case of multiblock datasets, choose the flat index of the dataset to volume render. The flat index must point to an unstructured grid dataset. If the input is not a multiblock dataset then this index is ignored.
Base-API definition for all representations shown in the default 3D view in ParaView i.e. (views, RenderView).
Set the visibility for this representation.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Set the visibility for the selection, if any.
Set the visibility for the cube axes.
Choose the type for the representation.
Choose the representation type for the backface.
This representation is used to show geometry as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe.
Set the input to the representation.
This representation is used to show unstructured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume
Set the input to the representation.
This representation is used to show image data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume/Slice.
Set the input to the representation.
This defines the common API used by all ClientDeliveryRepresentation proxies.
Used only when ReductionType is CUSTOM.
Used only when ReductionType is CUSTOM.
If set to a non-negative value, then produce results using only the node Id specified.
If true, the filter will generate vtkOriginalProcessIds arrays indicating the process id on which the cell/point was generated.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
A basic client delivery representation.
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
Defines API common to all chart representations. Don't use directly.
Visibility of the representation.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
Property providing list of available series that can be plotted.
Set the array to use on X axis. This is used only when UseIndexForXAxis is set to 0.
When set, the array index will be used for X axis, otherwise the array identified by XArrayName will be used.
#endif
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
Representation used by BarChartView.
Data input for the representation.
#endif
#ifdef VTK_USE_QVTK
Representation used by XYPlotView.
Data input for the representation.
Representation used by XYChartView.
Data input for the representation.
Visibility of the representation.
Property providing list of available series that can be plotted.
Set the array to use on X axis. This is used only when UseIndexForXAxis is set to 0.
When set, the array index will be used for X axis, otherwise the array identified by XArrayName will be used.
!-- New representation for ContextView based charts. -->
Representation used by XYChartView.
Representation used by XYBarChartView.
#endif
Representation used to deliver blocks of data to the client.
Set the maximum number of blocks to cache on the client.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
Representation used to deliver blocks of data to the client. This representation delivers a subset of selection pertinent to the block that would have been delivered if we were using a BlockDeliveryRepresentation.
Set the maximum number of blocks to cache on the client.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
When set to 1, this representations shows only the selected cells (or points). The change will effect only after calling Update(). Note that changing this will clean all cache.
Specify the corners of the outline when in Oriented mode, the values are supplied as 8*3 double values.
Representation proxy for the the box widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the box 3D widget.
Representation proxy for the the sphere widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.
Representation proxy for the the spline widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.
Representation proxy for the the Contour widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.
Representation proxy used to show text.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
Representation used to add labels to points/cells of any dataset.
CubeAxesRepresentation is a representation for any dataobject which simply shows an axes along the bounding box of the dataobject.
Input around which the bound box is to be shown.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
Representation to scatter plots. The plot can be in 2D or 3D.
Set the input to the representation. Can be any vtkDataObject producer.
Set the input to the representation. Can be any vtkPointSet producer.
This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.
Property providing list of available series that can be plotted.
Set the array to use on X axis.
Set the array to use on Y axis.
Set the array to use on Z axis.
Set the array to use for color.
Set the array to use for scaling the glyphs.
Set the array to use for choosing the right glyph to display.
Set the array to use for orienting the glyphs.
Set the visibility for this representation.
Set the visibility for the cube axes.
Set the array name to color by. If no array name is set, or choosen array is not available, then the image scalars are used by default.

StringVectorProperty.name: VisibilityInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of visibility for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: Visibility
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series visibility.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineThicknessInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line thickness for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineThickness
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line thickness.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineStyleInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line style for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineStyle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line style.

StringVectorProperty.name: LabelInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of labels for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: Label
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series labels.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line color for the series.

StringVectorProperty.name: Color
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line color.

StringVectorProperty.name: MarkerStyleInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of marker style for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: MarkerStyle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series marker style.

StringVectorProperty.name: VisibilityInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of visibility for the series.

StringVectorProperty.name: Visibility
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series visibility.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineThicknessInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line thickness for the series.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineThickness
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line thickness.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineStyleInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line style for the series.

StringVectorProperty.name: LineStyle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line style.

StringVectorProperty.name: LabelInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of labels for the series.

StringVectorProperty.name: Label
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series labels.

StringVectorProperty.name: MarkerStyleInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of marker style for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: MarkerStyle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series marker style.

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisCorner
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line style.

StringVectorProperty.name: PenColorInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line color for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: Color
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line color.

ChartNamedOptionsModelProxy.name: BarChartSeriesOptions
ChartNamedOptionsModelProxy.Documentation: Series options proxy for BoxWidgetRepresentation2. Don't create this directly, it's a subproxy in the BarChartRepresentation.

StringVectorProperty.name: BrushColorInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property which has the current state of line color for the series available currently.

StringVectorProperty.name: Color
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the series line color.
